idea-plugin.name: Material Design Dark-Theme
idea-plugin.description: A jetbrains theme plugin use(may not) material design
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.7.5

  • adjust checkbox colors

1.7.4

  • fit to Intellij 2019.2 eap5
  • adjust some color
  • give more dark color for editor background

1.7.2

  • fit to Intellij 2019.2 eap3
  • Replace tree arrows to MD icons

1.7.2

  • fit to Intellij 2019.2 eap2
  • use IDEA-214797 to define common colors

1.7

  • Remove the vote notification. Thanks to IntellijContest2019!

1.5

  • replace the tree arrow(thanks for flaticon.com)
  • add big circular progress for settings|plugin page(thanks for jetbrains support)

1.4 add circular progress indicator(thanks for loading.io)
1.3 add border for not need edit textfield(eg: Main class textfield in run/debug application configuration)
1.2 adjust some stripeColor
1.1 adjust plugin page background color
